content: the short row brioche hat is a knit-look crochet hat with lovely shaped top worked flat from side to side in repeating sections wedges shaped with easy short row **don t miss a thing ** subscribe to my free newsletter 1 to stay updated with new free crochet patterns tutorials and other yarnie things follow me on instagram 2 follow my fb page myhobbyiscrochet 3 for daily free crochet pattern links share your projects and get advice in our facebook group my hobby is crochet 4 get more crochet inspiration in my pinterest boards 5 check out my youtube channel 6 1 https //landing mailerlite com/webforms/landing/n1x3g9 2 https //www instagram com/myhobbyiscrochet/ hl=de 3 https //www facebook com/myhobbyiscrochet ref=hl 4 https //www facebook com/groups/myhobbyiscrochet/ 5 https //www pinterest de/myhobbyiscroche/ 6 https //www youtube com/c/myhobbyiscrochetblog
